alert.note: Alert for Ellsworth; Rice (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 8:55PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rice and Ellsworth Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 855 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Kanopolis to 5 miles southwest of Raymond. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lyons, Ellsworth, Sterling, Kanopolis, Little River, Chase, Holyrood, Bushton, Geneseo, Alden, Lorraine, Raymond, Frederick, Ellsworth Airport, Silica, Kanopolis Lake and Kanopolis State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
